attributes.action: Mandatory labeling on all meat products stating if it was stunned, pre-slaughter
attributes.additional_details: For example, meat sold in supermarkers, for example, be it a beef/veal or sheep meat, might have been slaughtered without the use of a stun-gun or other pre-stun method. Some religions do not allow the consumption of animal hind quarters, so that meat is then sold off to the general market where the general public, who might not wish to eat such a product, could unwittingly purchase it.
attributes.background: I care about the welfare of farm animals in the UK that are bred for food and simply want consumers to be aware as to what they might be buying so that they can choose to purchase it, or not.
